content: introducing the woodland scarf crochet pattern perfect for all skill levels using a larger hook with a weight 3 yarn creates a beautiful lightweight airy fabric the fringe adds a stylish detail stay warm and comfortable this winter **materials needed-** yarn mandala dk weight 590-610 yards or any weight #3 yarn hook 9mm us size 13 0 follow me on instagram www instagram com/leapingloops http //www instagram com/leapingloops tiktok www tiktok com/leapingloops http //www tiktok com/leapingloops youtube www youtube com/@leapingloops http //www youtube com/@leapingloops www leapingloops com http //www leapingloops com/
